name: 2 Foxes and the Puzzling Forest (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the Puzzling Forest, where everyday is its own (puzzling) adventure! Our companions, the 2 Foxes, have stumbled upon this forest and found themselves lost by it's puzzling nature.   Help these 2 Foxes navigate this Puzzling Forest  by pushing blocks, creating paths, and even going through foxholes in order to return to their safe house...at least, before a new puzzle is introduced!

This demo is currently only available for Windows as a downloadable game.

Special thanks to Zygobot Studios and Full Sail University for helping bring this game to reality!
